newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT- First Albany starts network stocks.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT- First Albany starts network stocks.

text.p: -- First Albany analyst Matt Barzowskas said he initiated coverage of eight companies in the enterprise networking field and said he expected the market to grow at more than 30 percent per year for the next three years.
-- He rated Cisco Systems Inc, 3Com Corp and Cabletron Systems Inc as buy and Bay Networks Inc as a neutral. He noted that the four companies have "broken away from the mass of networking vendors."
-- The analyst said there was still opportunities in certain niche markets, in particular, for remote access equipment used to connect remote PCs to central offices.
-- In this area, he initated Ascend Communications Inc, Shiva Corp, U.S. Robotics Corp and Xircom Inc, all with buy ratings. He said they were the companies best focused on high-growth niche markets.
-- He said Bay remained in a transition mode and suggested investors remain on the sideline until it makes further progress.
